bshields.istation.interfaces

Interface VendingMachine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultVendingMachine

    public interface VendingMachine
    Represents a whole vending machine, from snack contents to money to keypad.
    Author:
    Brian

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void addShelf(Shelf shelf)

    • Method Detail

      • getShelves

        List<Shelf> getShelves()
        Gets a copy of the list of shelves in the vending machine. Modifications to the copy will not be reflected in the contents of the machine.
        Returns:
        a copy of the shelf collection

      • addShelf

        void addShelf(Shelf shelf)
        Adds a shelf to the bottom of the machine
        Parameters:
        shelf - the shelf to add
        See Also:
        addShelf(Shelf, int)

      • addShelf

        void addShelf(Shelf shelf,
              int index)
        Adds a shelf to the machine
        Parameters:
        shelf - the shelf to add
        index - the location to add the shelf

      • removeShelf

        boolean removeShelf(Shelf shelf)
        Removes the first instance of the given shelf from the machine.
        Parameters:
        shelf - the shelf to remove
        Returns:
        true if the shelf was present in the machine
        See Also:
        removeShelf(int)

      • removeShelf

        Shelf removeShelf(int index)
        Removes a shelf from the given location in the machine
        Parameters:
        index - the location to remove a shelf from
        Returns:
        the shelf that was removed
        See Also:
        removeShelf(Shelf)
